title: 执行报错“error: unable to recognize "fileserver.yaml": no matches for kind "Deployment" in version "apps/v1beta1"”
body:
在配置好k8s，mlflow，hadoop，hdfs，volcano
后，
执行，
`bash elastic-control.sh -r -u 4 -m 4 -t 2 -p 2 -b 5 -s slot.conf -f data.config`
报错，报错信息如下：
```
cube.yaml written to ./cube.yaml
transfer.yaml written to ./transfer.yaml
File server yaml written to fileserver.yaml
Main yaml written to fleet-ctr.yaml
start file-server pod
service/file-server created
error: unable to recognize "fileserver.yaml": no matches for kind "Deployment" in version "apps/v1beta1"
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
searching file-server external IP, wait a moment.
error in K8S cluster, cannot continue. Aborted
[FAILED] config_resource: upload_slot_conf failed
```
想请教下，是需要更改fileserver.yaml中的配置嘛还是？
谢谢

title: 这个是否达到生产可用？文档能否多一些？
body: 请问有微信群或者QQ群吗？或者维护人员的微信给一个也行

title: cluster_config.md 文档中的kubectl链接表述有问题
body: [cluster_config.md](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/ElasticCTR/blob/master/cluster_config.md) 中给出的kubectl下载链接只能用在mac（darwin）不能用在linux，没有给出说明
